description:
SoundFont Midi Player is a powerful midi player/router and real time midi synth combo, especially useful for Soundblaster (Live, Audigy, X-fi) users who can load soundfonts automatically and real time. Bassmidi output mode enables this feature to anyone.
		
		Features:
		---------
    1. Fully configurable Midi in and out ports.
    2. Real time program and bank modification on any midi channel.
    3. Real Time effects on any midi channel.
    4. Mute and solo on any channels.
    5. Variable Tempo and Pitch during playback.
    6. Virtual Piano (F1-F8 Function keys for octave change, right click for note name).
    7. Chord mode for Virtual Piano and Midi input.
    8. Send Sysex for Synth (GM, GS, XG, GM2, NX and custom).
    9. Midi send and receive over Net.
    10. Karaoke midi file, xmi, rmi, mds, mus, miz file support.
    11. Module files (mod, xm, s3m, it) playback support via realtime converting.
    12. Bassmidi output mode.
    13. Spectrum Analyzer.
    14. Record to wave, mp3 (or any acm codecs) capability .
    15 .Real time soundfont and SysEx loading from playlist
    16. Supports embedded SF2 soundfonts.
    17. Scale effect settings (transpose notes to different scales).
    18. Supports Cakewalk/Sonar instrument definition (.ins) files for preset names
    19. Supports capturing/recording from Midi input including SysEx messages.
    20. Supports VST effect/visualization and VSTi instrument plugins.
    21. Includes Midi event viewer/debugger for low level debugging/editing purposes.
    22. Fully supports Windows 9x, XP, 7, 8, 10 moreover Wine.
summary: SoundFont Midi Player is a powerful Midi player/router and real time Midi synth combo
author: Zoltán Bacskó (Falcosoft)
